titles.title: Good Samaritan Remediation of Orphan Hardrock Mines Act of 2018
A bill to promote remediation of orphan hardrock mines, and for other purposes.
Good Samaritan Remediation of Orphan Hardrock Mines Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Good Samaritan Remediation of Orphan Hardrock Mines Act of 2018
This bill: (1) requires the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to establish a pilot program under which the EPA grants permits for Good Samaritans to remediate historic mine residue at orphan hardrock mine sites, and (2) establishes a Good Samaritan Mine Remediation Fund for land management agencies that authorize Good Samaritans to conduct remediation projects on federal land.
